All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionSequence
An object of this class represents a sequence of Camelot Actions
AddToList
 
Attack
A character attacks another character using the item in their right hand.
Bash
A character bashes the specified furniture with their right hand.
BodyTypes
 
Builder
 
BuilderMethod
 
Cast
Character casts a spell.
Cast.Spell
 
Characters
A character is an interactable (IInteract) and creatable (ICreate).
Clap
A character claps for a few seconds where they are standing or sitting.
ClearList
 
CloseCreditsChoice
This class implements IPlayerChoice to represent when the player presses x at the top right of the credits window to close it
CloseFurniture
Character walks to a furniture and closes it.
CloseListChoice
This class implements IPlayerChoice to represent when the player presses x at the top right of the list window to close it
CloseNarrationChoice
This class implements IPlayerChoice to represent when the player presses x at the top right of the narration window to close it
Clothing
Clothing Queen and Witch only work for bodytypes: A, C, E, and G Clothing King and Warlock only work for bodytypes: B, D, F, and H
Colors
 
Create<T extends ICreate<?>>
Use This action to create a place or item.
CreateAll
Use this class to create all places and items in your story.
CreateCharacterSequence
Use this class to create each of your characters.
CreateEffect
Creates a temporary effect on an entity which disappears after a few seconds.
CreditsSequence
Use this class to show the credits window.
Dance
The character dances.
DialogChoice
This class implements IPlayerChoice to represent the player selecting a dialog option
DialogSequence
Use this class to create a dialog with one or more lines and one or more dialog options.
Die
A character dies where they're standing.
DisableEffect
Hides an effect that was previously enabled on a character, item, or furniture.
DisableIcon
The story graph automatically creates instances of this class.
DisableInput
Disables mouse and keyboard controls.
DisablePlayerOptionsSequence
 
Draw
Character draws an item and holds it with their right hand.
Drink
Character drinks from the items they're holding in their left hand.
Edge
An object of this class represents an edge in your storygraph
Effects
 
EnableEffect
Creates an effect on an entity which remains until disabled.
EnableIcon
The story graph automatically creates instances of this class.
EnableInput
Enables mouse and keybord input for the character that is set to the focus of the camera by SetCameraFocus.
EnablePlayerOptionsSequence
 
Enter
Character enters from a door.
Event<T>
 
Exit
Character walks to, opens, and exits through a door.
Face
Character turns to face another character, item, or furniture within the same place.
FadeIn
The screen fades in from black.
FadeOut
The screen fades out to black.
Furniture
This class represents a piece of furniture.
FurnitureTypes
 
Give
Character walks to and hands an item to another character with their left hand.
Graph
An object of this class represents a story graph
HairStyle
Hairstyles Ponytail and Straight only work for bodytypes: A, C, E, and G Hairstyle Short_Full, Mage, Mage_Full, Musketeer, and Musketeer_Full only work for bodytypes: B, D, F, and H
HideCredits
Closes the credits window.
HideDialog
Closes the dialog window.
HideFurniture
Hides a piece of furniture.
HideList
Closes the list window.
HideMenu
To start Camelot for the player, you must first use ShowMenu.
HideNarration
Closes the narration window.
IAction
This class represents a Camelot action.
ICreate<T>
This class represents a Camelot component that can be created, e.g.
IInteract
This class represents the interactable entities in Camelot.
IPlayerChoice
This class represents a player choice or an edge of a story graph
Item
This class represents an item.
ItemTypes
 
KeyboardChoice
This class implements IPlayerChoice to represent when the player presses a keyboard key.
KeyboardChoice.Keys
An enum representing all the keyboard keys that the player can press, Esc for pause, I for inventory, and E for interact
Kneel
A character kneels down where they are standing.
Laugh
A character laughs where they are standing or sitting.
ListSequence
Use this class to display a list of interactables.
LookAt
A character will turn their head to keep looking at another character, item, or furniture.
MenuChoice
This class implements IPlayerChoice to represent when the player presses the Start button on the main menu.
MenuChoice.Options
An enum representing all the main menu buttons that the player can press
Messenger
 
NarrationSequence
Use this class to show narration to the player.
Node
This class represents a node and its edges in the story graph.
NodeBuilder
Use this class to implement the nodes of your storygraph
OpenFurniture
A character walks to a piece of furniture and opens it.
PathTypes
 
Pickup
A character bends down to pick up an item from the ground.
Place
This class represents a place.
PlaceTypes
 
PlayerInteraction
PlayerInteraction is the class you must use to create a player choice via interacting with other entities.
PlayerInteraction.Icons
These icons are only visual and have no other effect on the code.
PlaySound
Plays a short sound effect or background music.
Pocket
A character puts the item they're holding in their left hand in their pocket.
Put
Character extends their arm to put an item they're holding in their left hand.
Putdown
A character bends down to put down an item on the ground.
Revive
A dead character comes back to life and stands up.
SetCameraBlend
Sets the duration of camera transitions when using SetCameraMode and SetCameraFocus.
SetCameraFocus
Set the focus of the main camera to an entity.
SetCameraMode
Set camera mode to track, follow, or focus.
SetCameraMode.Mode
 
SetClothing
Changes the outfit of a character.
SetCredits
 
SetDay
Sets the time of the day to daytime.
SetDialog
 
SetExpression
Changes the expression and gesture of a character.
SetExpression.Expression
 
SetHairColor
Changes the hair color of a character.
SetHairStyle
Changes the hair style of a character.
SetLeft
 
SetNarration
 
SetNight
Changes the time of day to night time.
SetPosition
Create an instance of this class whenever you want to change the position of a character or item.
SetRight
 
SetSkinColor
Changes the outfit of a character.
SetTitle
Sets the title of the story shown on the main menu.
Sheathe
Character sheathes the item they're holding in their right hand.
ShowCredits
 
ShowDialog
 
ShowFurniture
Makes a previously hidden furniture to appear again.
ShowList
 
ShowMenu
To start Camelot for the player, you must first use ShowMenu.
ShowNarration
 
Sit
A character sits down on a piece of furniture.
Sleep
A character lies down on a piece of furniture.
Story
This class represents a story that we want to tell using Camelot.
Take
The specified character walks to an item and takes it.
Unpocket
A character takes something out of their pocket and holds them in their left hand.
UserInput<T>
 
Wait
The action succeeds after the specified number of seconds.
WalkTo
Character walks to a target position.
Wave
A character waves their hand in the air where they are standing or sitting.
